title: The Character-to-Agent Standard
core_principles: Narrative creates the character; canon makes the character executable.
Every character must follow the CCACS folder contract.
Doctrine and decision trees prevent drift.
registry_requirements: Each character must be listed in characters/registry/CHARACTERS_INDEX.json.
Registry entry must include character_id, name, book of origin, status (dormant/active), canonical path, and version.
governance_implications: Characters cannot be activated without passing validation and tests.
Activation requires attestation and version tags.
agent_requirements: Use character doctrine as a binding constraint.
Fail closed and remain dormant when uncertain.
schema_impact: Finalize schemas for doctrine, decision trees, and authority scope.
Add a schema for character registry entries.
